    • 方法详细资料

      • generateNextTransition

        public Transition generateNextTransition(RectF drawableBounds,
                                RectF viewport)
        从接口复制的说明: TransitionGenerator
        Generates the next transition to be played by the KenBurnsView.
        指定者:
        generateNextTransition 在接口中 TransitionGenerator
        参数:
        drawableBounds - the bounds of the drawable to be shown in the KenBurnsView.
        viewport - the rect that represents the viewport where the transition will be played in. This is usually the bounds of the KenBurnsView.
        返回:
        a Transition object to be played by the KenBurnsView.

      • setTransitionDuration

        public void setTransitionDuration(long transitionDuration)
        Sets the duration, in milliseconds, for each transition generated.
        指定者:
        setTransitionDuration 在接口中 TransitionGenerator
        参数:
        transitionDuration - the transition duration.

      • setTransitionInterpolator

        public void setTransitionInterpolator(Interpolator interpolator)
        Sets the Interpolator for each transition generated.
        参数:
        interpolator - the transition interpolator.
